features: ECO-STRIP LAUNDRY BUNDLE: The Tru Earth Eco-Strips Laundry Detergent and Fabric Softener bundle is essential for a simple laundry routine. Lightweight and easy to use, just add one of each strip into your washing machine, close the door, and start the wash cycle.

PLASTIC JUG-FREE: Reduce plastic waste while saving precious cabinet space. Tru Earth Eco-Strips have a smaller footprint than traditional powder or liquid detergents and softeners. They come in cardboard packaging and each strip safely dissolves in water during use.

FIRST OF ITS KIND: Tru Earth's ultra-concentrated fabric softener is the industry's first laundry softener sheet designed for your washing machine, not your dryer. This liquid alternative can be used with any standard or HE washing machines in both hot and cold water settings.
UNCOMPROMISING CLEANING POWER: Each strip of Tru Earth laundry detergent weighs just 0.1oz and removes tough stains, reveals vibrant colors, and restores radiant whites.

ULTIMATE LIFE HACK AND COLLEGE DORM ROOM ESSENTIALS: Our compact laundry detergent and softener free space in your home, RV or college dorm as you no longer have to store huge plastic jugs - great gift idea for back to school, van life, or your own home.
body.description: Tru Earth Eco-Strips Laundry Bundle Alternative to Liquid and Powder Detergents and Softeners The Tru Earth Eco-Strips Laundry Detergent and Fabric Softener bundle is essential for a simple laundry routine. Lightweight and easy to use, just add one of each strip into your washing machine, close the door, and start the wash cycle. Our gentle formula is paraben-free, phosphate-free, cruelty-free, friendly to the environment, septic and gray water safe and works with all washing machines and temperature settings and our strips fully dissolve each time.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #42,792 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #289 in Liquid Laundry Detergent

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Step 1: Tear a Strip of Each Use one strip of each per load of laundry. No need to measure and pour. Step 2: Add Strips to Washer Works in all washing machines, including HE. Step 3: Add Laundry into Washer. Safe for all types of fabrics. Step 4: Start the Wash Cycle Strips dissolve completely in hot or cold water.

Tru Earth Eco-Strips Laundry Bundle Alternative to Liquid and Powder Detergents and Softeners The Tru Earth Eco-Strips Laundry Detergent and Fabric Softener bundle is essential for a simple laundry routine. Lightweight and easy to use, just add one of each strip into your washing machine, close the door, and start the wash cycle. Our gentle formula is paraben-free, phosphate-free, cruelty-free, friendly to the environment, septic and gray water safe and works with all washing machines and temperature settings and our strips fully dissolve each time. Paraben-free Phosphate-free Plastic Jug-Free Scent Booster

Powerful Patent-Pending Formula Our innovative softener formula provides a naturally soft feel to all your clothes, delicates, bed sheets, curtains and other fabrics while also significantly reducing wrinkles. Just add a single strip into your washing machine with your laundry detergent when you are ready to start the wash cycle, close the door, and start up the machine. No fuss, no mess. Friendly to the Planet and Plastic Jug-Free Tru Earth Eco-Strips are the next step in our ongoing initiative to help reduce plastic waste while helping you enjoy a cleaner and happier home. Our innovative strips are chlorine bleach-free, paraben-free, and phosphate-free. They come in plastic-free recyclable cardboard packaging. Plus, they are cruelty-free and septic and grey water safe. Convenient Size Each Tru Earth Eco-Strip is 2 x 3.8 in (5.1 x 9.7 cm) making them so easy to store - they take up very little shelf space! No liquid detergents or fabric softeners in bulky plastic jugs means no measuring, no spills, drips or splashes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like these because they did the job of cleaning my clothes and they are made in the U.S. or Canada.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about the detergent and fabric softener. From the easy use, to low suds and fragrance. Also no clutter from bottles and no heavy lifting. I will be purchasing again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It cleans the clothes very well easy to use. Doesn’t take any space in the pantry. I like not having the big jugs taking up space. And I like the thought of cleaning up the environment. The detergent, one dissolves very nicely, the fabric softener little tougher to dissolve you have to put it right in with the clothes. The scent it’s a little weak but nice. The cost is very reasonable. I may keep using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these for a trip we were taking & renting a house. They are so easy for traveling & do a great job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what they promise!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using TruEarth for some time now and I absolutely love both products! No more heavy plastic jugs just two envelopes on the shelf. And the clean and soft is amazing! I'm never going back. I have clean fresh laundry, I don't have to worry about recycling the jugs and it just couldn't be easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these and I will never be going back to liquid or powder detergent these are perfect they smell light everything comes out clean! Officially a long life purchaser now I just need some coupons lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Still Using Liquids to Pre-Treat. Otherwise, The Sheets Do Have Cleaning/Softening Power
reviews.reviewText: These arrived packaged in a non-descript white paper envelope measuring about 6½” x 9½” x ¼” and weighing just over (5½) ounces (no need to struggle with oversized plastic bottles of detergent and softener). I opened the white envelope to find two (2) cardboard paper sleeves of similar size as the envelope, just thinner. The one (1) sleeve had Tru Earth’s Laundry Detergent [white in color] Eco-Strips and the other their Fabric Softener [pink in color] Eco-Strips. Both noted they were Ultra Concentrated. Both cautioned they were eye irritant’s and to wash hands, after use. Both contained 32 strips, representing a single load. The laundry sheets weighed in about 2¾ ounces and the softener sheets were just under 2¼ ounces. There was no reference as to what constituted a “load.” Is it by weight or some sort of volume? Do I guess? Small loads are a half strip; normal is a strip and large is two (2) strips. The scent boosters were linen, and they had a strong aroma, but I did not such offensive. There is a reference for all machines and HE machines. However, nothing whether one (1) machine should have different amounts of strips. My understanding is that a medium load is 6 pounds of clothing, a large load is 11 pounds and an extra-large is 21 pounds. Each sheet is about 37 cents, as of August 2023.These are a good value, considering you the number of loads.The scent smells wonderful and leaves a light scent to the clothes, which is not that long-lasting. [There is no accounting for smell, so it’s up to the individual beholder to decide about the fragrance. It’s not annoying and is more typical than atypical of a strong linen scent.]I use a top-loading high efficiency [HE] wash machine, with an agitator. Our area has hard water, so a single to two sheets seems to lather-up nice for a large load. For a super-sized load, we may use as much as three (3) sheets to four (4) sheets. Our wash machine is big and deep. I simply drop-in the necessary sheets in, I do at the start, load laundry, allow the cycle to go through. Since we typically run larger loads, we use more laundry sheets. The sheets, to me, are delicate and can tear easily, on the other hand, they also dissolve fast. Liquid mess, of course is eliminated, but I wash my hands after touching these sheets or I wear gloves.There is a reference that these are hypoallergenic, which I believe, because no skin irritations were caused.These sheets are part of a category which focuses on an interest in sustainability, environment, and being biodegradable.No direct pre-soak option with sheetsTo test, I had clothes with various stains, a little, not a lot, such as blood, food stains, salad oil, chocolate, coffee, dirt, and grass. I know these stains are hard to remove. Now the problem with these sheets, is that I cannot put detergent directly on the stain, to soak in. I washed in cold water, normal cycle, cold water, maximum spin, and extra heavy cycle. I think the results fair. Again, normally, I pretreat. But I wanted to see what would happen. The stains were still there, just lighter. I think for a non-stained wash, these are competitive, but I am not tossing out the liquid detergent at this time.Country of origin?Made in CanadaThoughtsI like the idea of no plastic, no space hogging bottles, and the other mentioned factors, like value, these are less than other sheets, which saved this from a three (3) star rating. Cleaning is fair, not stellar. Aroma is nice.I hope my thoughts added helpful information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TRU EARTH ECO-STIPS LAUNDRY BUNDLE DETERGENT & FABRIC SOFTNER SHEETS
reviews.reviewText: LOVE, LOVE the product. Just put the detergent strip in washer recepticle & the softner strip inside washer machine. Easy, No mess, safe, no problem with as I have sensitive skin, great for enviorment. No big heavy bottles to carry & store. Just a small pkg.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy for the environment and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Love this because it cleans well and it is easy to use. There is no plastic waste so its good for the environment and nice and light to carry home in your groceries as well as opposed to the big jugs of laundry detergents. It’s a bit pricier but worth it to me
Smell wasn’t muchIt was super faintHowever the washing came out clean
Best thing ever for me as no heavy lifting and helping save the environment. Clothes smell fresh an clean. Love the softener too.

reviews.reviewTitle: This has transformed my hate of laundry.
reviews.reviewText: I have been buying the same laundry detergent for well over 50 years. I loved it until the pods came out. Unfortunately, it left a residue on my clothing. Washing became a nightmare because I found I was rewashing at least half my load. Then I found these sheets. I can't tell you how much I love them. Where have they been. No one talks about laundry detergent. These sheets do the job. One and done. Just like the good old days. Just throw the two sheets in the washer and that is it. No residue. Just clean laundry. Now I have to mention the smell. It truly is amazing. Fresh and clean. This makes me look forward to laundry days. Just remember it cleans but doesn't remove stains. So you still have to treat any stains. I love these sheets. Recommend to family and friends. Try them, you will love them.
Smells great, saves space and easy to use. One of my favorite must have laundry items!
